attributes.action: Referendum for England, Wales and Northern Ireland in the event of a 'No' vote in the Scottish referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
In the event that the outcome of the Scottish Independence Referendum favours remaining in the United Kingdom, Scotland will have proved itself less than wholly committed to The Union and an uncertain political partner.

In order to prevent recurrence of the existing situation in years to come, with the undercurrent of Scottish nationalism likely to precipitate a future referendum, the remaining countries of the UK should hold a referendum on ejecting Scotland from the UK.
